entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hook onto the restore CollectPrunedPackageReferences target and provide the list of packages to be pruned to NuGet #44694
  • CrossgenLayout is missing Inputs & Outputs which causes it to run in a no-op incremental build #44682
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44678

Closed

  • "401 Unauthorized" (`HttpRequestException`) when installing tools #44684

PullRequests

Created

  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix OCI image tarball #44693
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • improve SDK incremental builds by not running redist-installer layout generation on inner loop builds #44687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.1 #44685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dev 9611 #44676
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass down PublicBaseURL for aspnetcore to direct it to download assets from the local artifacts assets path #44692
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Fix native install-dependencies.sh ref #44686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add package source mappings unit-tests #44649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • sln-list: Fix char conversions #44661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build #44631
    untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSTest among common templates #44523
    untriaged
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
